speaker: narrator
message: [i]Your hand rests on the door knob, nervous sweat interfering with your grip. Your machinations brought you to this moment. You glance over. Gog licks his hand and distributes the slime across what may or may not be hair on his head. Who awaits on the other side to save you from this horrible man?[/i]

speaker: narrator
message: [i]You turn the knob and open the door to see...[/i]

speaker: narrator
message: [i]Beside you, Gog kneels and pulls something out of a fold in his skin. The corners of your vision darken.[/i]

speaker: Prince Gog
message: Our two kingdoms will be one! A froggy place indeed! Today... [i]TOADDAY...[/i] you will make me the happiest frog alive!
